attributes.action: Drafting of a written Constitution, in which the people are SOVEREIGN
attributes.additional_details: A Constitution that is based on factual evidence of working constitutions, relevant to this day and age, captures the aspirations of the people of the U.K.,and finally ratified by a people’s assembly, comprising of peoples of all walks of life and persuasions.  A Constitution in which the people are SOVEREIGN
attributes.background: In view of the recent dishonest non prorogation of Parliament by an unelected Prime Minister and “agreeing” of the same by an unelected Head of State.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

You might like to sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/254852
